name: Rimworld Interface But Good
description:
Interface redesign for one of my most beloved videogames, Rimworld.


While the game itself is great, I always thought that UI has sort of placeholder-ish feel to it, so I made this research&redesign as an exercise, and also as an opportunity to practice autolayout and variants.


It's in half-finished and pretty messy state, however I feel that it relays the ideas for a better Rimworld nicely (and also is surprisingly adaptable, autolayout is the best).
